Department of AI & DS

Welcome to the Department of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science

Explore cutting-edge technologies, impactful research, and innovative projects that shape the future of AI and Data Science.

Our Vision

To become a center of excellence in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science education, research, and innovation.

Our Mission

To empower students with technical knowledge and research skills to solve real-world challenges in AI and Data domains.

Get Involved

Join our workshops, seminars, hackathons, and student chapters to deepen your expertise and build connections in the AI community.
